Jokowi Pilih Langsung Dewan Pengawas, KPK: Sudah Sesuai UU
02 Nov 2019, 01:27 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo nantinya memilih langsung Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK tanpa melalui panitia seleksi (pansel). KPK mengatakan mekanisme pemilihan dewan pengawas sudah pada UU Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 tentang perubahan UU KPK.
"Undang-Undang Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 itu kan memang mengatur ya terkait dengan mekanisme pemilihan dewan pengawas, sekaligus pengecualian untuk dewan pengawas yang pertama kali dipilih," kata Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah di kantornya, Jl Kuningan Persada, Jakarta Selatan, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Febri mengatakan pada UU Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 itu memang ada kewenangan dari Presiden Jokowi untuk memilih langsung Dewan Pengawas KPK. Menurut Febri, lebih baik mengikut mekanisme itu.
"Jadi mekanismenya saya kira disesuaikan saja ya di undang-undang 19 Tahun 2019 karena ada kewenangan Presidan untuk memilih di sana," ujarnya.
Meski demikian, Febri mengatakan KPK menyoroti sejumlah pasal yang ada UU KPK yang baru itu. Menurutnya, ada sejumlah pasal pada UU KPK itu yang multitafsir.
"UU Nomor 19 (Tahun 2019) memang kalau kita pelajari ada ya katakanlah perbedaan pemahaman ya. Kalau kita membahas antara pasal lain dan pasal yang lain lagi gitu beberapa pasal memang berbeda-beda tafsirnya," ucapnya.

Jokowi Directly Elects the Board of Trustees, KPK: It Is In Accordance with Law
02 Nov 2019, 01:27 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo will elect KPK's Board of Trustees (Dewas) directly without going through a selection committee (pansel). The KPK said the mechanism for electing the supervisory board had been in Law Number 19 of 2019 concerning changes to the KPK Law.
"Law Number 19 Year 2019 does indeed regulate yes related to the election mechanism of the supervisory board, as well as the exception for the supervisory board that was first elected," said KPK Kabiro PR spokesman Febri Diansyah in his office, Jl Kuningan Persada, South Jakarta, Friday (1 / 11/2019).
Febri said that in Law Number 19 Year 2019 there was indeed an authority from President Jokowi to directly elect the KPK Supervisory Board. According to Febri, it is better to follow the mechanism.
"So I think the mechanism will be adjusted according to Law 19 of 2019 because there is the authority of the President to vote there," he said.
However, Febri said the KPK highlighted a number of articles in the new KPK Law. According to him, there are a number of articles in the KPK Law that have multiple interpretations.
"Law Number 19 (2019), if we learn about it, let's say differences in understanding, yes. If we discuss between other articles and other articles, there are different interpretations," he said.
